message.body: You can beat the ticket then
?? No I don't think so bc I couldn't locate it
the ticket isn't for being unregistered, it's for not handing it to him
How can I prove that i had it in the car and also even if I did, what use is it if I couldn't locate it?
Anyway it isn't important. It's a good lesson for both of us bc

It shows that 1. I always think the worst (omg I left it at my dads, I thought I put it in the folder but I'm sure I screwed up and didn't- nah I Did put it in folder/ omg I am dumb and forgot checks at home omg I suck- nah, they were right where I thought I had put them) and 2.you have ADD and can't focus on finding something lol
So you can ignore my doomsday anxiety trips, and I'll ignore when you say you checked and something's not there
(Like my keys in your pocket at the obgyn lol)
Nissan Altima 70,000 miles thoughts
Trading
So same price
How about a Hyundai elantra
52,000 miles
Trade
Love Elantra!!!
Best cars ever
Really
Hyundai is a great car company
Really safe too!
Not THaT great mileage just normal 25 in city 33 highway isn't that just normal?
Anyway it's only 52,000 miles and it's a flat trade so I'll prob get it
It's blue and I dislike the color but whatever
That's pretty good
The Internet is saying 2008s usually have twice those miles on them
And also are usually 9,000
It's a great deal!
Come with a warent?
Warenty
So seems like a decent deal
9,000 from dealership and 8000 from person
So just trading for 6,500 seems good
Just 3 months like mine did
I hate the color and the stripe to color composition
That is my only problem w this car basically
I hate the width of the stripe
Hahahahahahaha aha
Hahaha
Love it
Lololol such a mom car
We need some fun stickers for it
LOL
It is Exactly the kind of car that has stickers
My kid is an honor student
Or "my husband rides mopeds

I told Brittany and she was surprisingly supportive and excited bc she said her sister just had an unplanned pregnancy and she totally understood the stress. She said congratulations and told me not to worry and that she'd replace me if I gave her some time (which obv I was going to do anyway!)
Yayay I called her. I wasn't a coward and texted. I'm proud of myself.
And I didn't apologize too much. I'm totally getting better at this being assertive thing. Little steps ya know.
And I had a lovely dinner w Ishmael and he wants to come visit us in Mexico! He's so excited too! He's so wonderful. ☺️

2008 honda civic 43,000 miles BUT a rebuilt title, claims it is due to a car hitting the passenger side door- a body shop is selling it. I looked up the carfax and it had a battery replace in 2010, tires replace/brakes replaced/spark plugs replaced in 2012 and everything on carfax looks legit (extensive detailed history from pep boys/honda dealership) - I know I can't really resell it with a rebuilt title but whatcha think?? $7000
They said I can drive it now so I'll head over unless you think that is a big no no
Do you think something awful happened to it in the accident and that's why it is cheap
Prob hmmmmmm it looks purty
No no no
Haha ok
Boooooo
That's wayyyy too much
Really !?? Most are far more
But the rebuilt title is bogus
Could have structural issues
Most are 9000 and like over 100,000 miles but they have clean titles
Yeah
Totally
I thought maybe a mechanic could look it over first?
No not even worth it?
If you want but it's kinda lame compared to the Elantra
Too risky
The elantra is so ugly!
But it's such a good car.
The Elantra has won so many JD Powers awards and best of the year awards
But it is not a light blue or a dark blue it is the worst blue possible as if I'm a chromatic color field painter from La
It's like a dopey friend who's super reliable
And poorly dressed!!!
Ye
Yes
You can at least cover the white stripe?
Or change it's color?
Yeah. Moped style but yes
The bright white on the blue is reminiscent of a flashy toothpaste as
*advertisement
Look for more elantras
Lololol ❤️

Uh you should get a job showing cars at that dealership bc this new dude was a dairy manager at a grocery store before he got hired a month ago and he is dumb as shit just like my last salesperson/initial show person was
I asked him if the stripes on the car were painted or vinyl bc the 2008 elantras online don't seem to have that big white stripe
And he was like 'what stripe'
And I said 'the stripe on the car' and he said
'What stripe on the car? I'm confused'
He also knew Nothing about any of the cars we test drove and seemed confused about how to pronounce the names of the cars
I think they're hiring people based on what they look like
Bc both Looked like car salesman
None of the stock pics have that stripe, maybe it can be removed easily
Ew I found the name of the paint color
'Regatta blue pearl' :::hurl:::
